13.content:
The meteor crashes close to a isolated house from the outside world. In that house lives a crazy futa ugly old hag who people think might be a witch or at least she looks like one from a scary horror movie https://imgur.com/fVR2r1N

Right when the meteor hit the ground, a couple was passing by, having no idea about this abandoned looking house, they just got married and wanted a isolated place to spend their Honeymoon. https://imgur.com/a/VZNOKYY
The one in the right was named Camelia and is a 53 years old futa, the one in the left is a 47 years old female named Gina

The couple sees the meteor and goes to investigate and thinks if they should get closer or not after seeing a black goo coming out of the meteor and goes to the house direction from were they start hearing a young woman screaming, who is actually the prisoner of the hag.
13.title: isolated house

info.brief_description: Women only world with females and futa, choose were the symbiote ends up ;)
info.description:
The rules are simple:

1. Every transformation needs to have muscle growing and monstrous look, if they don't have these 2 then that means that host doesn't use the symbiote right and in the next chapter needs to lose the symbiote
2. Males don't exist in this world, the world had 2 genders who look almost the same, female and futa, the females have pussy only and futas have cock with balls only! No one has both genitals
3. When you create a character try to make her interesting and not just a bland character and if you can include a link for her image too that's even better
4. You can bond someone with multiple symbiotes, doing this will end up in her growing not only in muscles in monstrosity but also size, getting much taller
5. The symbiote is weak to fire and very loud sounds like a church bell for example
